title: Chocolate Crackle Cookie
instructions: Mix sugar, cocoa, & oil in medium bowl. Beat in eggs, one at a time, until combined. Stir in vanilla. Combine flour, baking powder, & salt in another bowl. Gradually stir flour mixture into the cocoa mixture until thoroughly mixed. Cover dough & refrigerate for at least 4 hrs. Preheat oven to 350°. Line two cookie sheets with parchment paper. Roll or scoop chilled dough into 1-inch balls. Coat each ball in powdered sugar & place 1-inch apart on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake 10-12 mins. Let stand on cookie sheet for a few mins before transferring to wire racks to cool. May be frozen for up to 3 months either dough or baked. 58 cal per cookie.
